imdb.plot outline: Exquisite Corpse is a 'Surreality Show' depicting the production of a short film by 5 different directors using the surrealist technique of collective creation of the same name. In an old house for 9 days in a row, each director wrote, directed and edited one minute of the story, subsequent to and based only on the page of script written by the director that preceded him. Each had the same crew, equipment, time and location and had one day of pre production to write, one day to shoot and a third day to post-produce their minute of contribution to the final work. All production processes were overlapped with each of the other directors during the 9 days and culminated in a public event where the resulting short film was screened.
imdb.title: Cadáver exquisito
plot: Exquisite Corpse is a 'Surreality Show' depicting the production of a short film by 5 different directors using the surrealist technique of collective creation of the same name. In an old house for 9 days in a row, each director wrote, directed and edited one minute of the story, subsequent to and based only on the page of script written by the director that preceded him. Each had the same crew, equipment, time and location and had one day of pre production to write, one day to shoot and a third day to post-produce their minute of contribution to the final work. All production processes were overlapped with each of the other directors during the 9 days and culminated in a public event where the resulting short film was screened.::Anonymous
